name: Tomato
description: Slightly acidic. Rich in carotene. Suited for South Indian style cooking.

name: Onion
description: Aids in reducing inflammation. Ideal for home cooking.

name: Potato
description: Uniform sandy texture, no lumps, great taste. Rich in potassium.

name: Green Apples
description: Rich in Vitamin A, B, and C. Shelf life - 2 days when refrigerated(2-4°C)

name: Banana
description: Sweet tasting and rich in Vitamin C, healthy fats, and potassium.

name: Kiwi
description: Tangy-sweet in taste. Shelf life - 2 days when refrigerated(2-4°C).

name: Tur Dal
description: Tur Dal is the most common dal found in homes. It is very nutritive.

name: Nestle Milkmaid
description: Made from double toned milk, it gives you the right taste and nutrition.

name: Sunflower Oil
description: Sunflower Oil is a healthy and nutritious oil. It makes you feel light.
